parameters.name: session_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, which is initially pre-processed to obtain

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Digital signature (Generated as shown in Ex.)

response_fields.name: store
response_fields.description: Integer price less IVA and VN. Simply it for other business

response_fields.name: username
response_fields.description: Integer price applies IVA and. Simply it for

response_fields.name: channel_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for get UH required by each channel

response_fields.name: desc_url
response_fields.description: The inner of the item in the shopping key of unified session. Just like: {"key name": [{item field1}, {item field2}]} ex: if the passed session

response_fields.name: desc_h
response_fields.description: Request server identifier for an item

response_fields.name: share
response_fields.description: Name of the item in your language

response_fields.name: price_info
response_fields.description: The inner price info representing the currency and units of the item

response_fields.name: country_price
response_fields.description: The unified price of the item in the being country. Contains price and currency description

response_fields.name: original_price
response_fields.description: The original price of the item in the being country
